title: Faced With Crisis, Trudeau Forced to Shift on Immigration
description: (Bloomberg) -- In the early days of Canada’s response to the coronavirus, before the crisis captured the full attention of Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government, it was still business as usual on at least one front: immigration.On March 12, the day befor…
